mapper.insert: insert into shopping_address (id, user_id, province, city, district, address, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update shopping_address set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, province, city, district, address, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag,phone,name,post_code from shopping_address where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, province, city, district, address, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, phone, name,post_code from shopping_address where user_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
